description: Karanayakage Ranjith Vijitha Kumara alias Godelle Wasantha Vs Hon. Attorney General. before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Karanayakage Ranjith Vijitha Kumara alias Godelle Wasantha Vs Hon. Attorney General.
keywords: Offence of kidnapping – Offence of rape on a minor – Evaluation of evidence - Effect of errors – Mistake as regards to the date on which the offence was committed – Aggravating circumstances – The degree of pre-planning by the appellant and the repeated commission of the offence.
legistation: -Section 354 of the Penal Code. -Section 364(2)(e) of the Penal Code. -Section 166 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No. 15 of 1979.
